segments.text: I see a kitchen scene, quite busy in its own way.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman at the sink is completely engrossed in drying a plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her focus is so intense, she hasn't noticed the running water.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sink is truly overflowing, water sheeting down the cabinets.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A growing puddle now surrounds her feet on the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: How can she not feel that cold water soaking her dress?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's astonishing how oblivious someone can be to their immediate surroundings.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is just pouring, a continuous stream, onto the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Soon the entire kitchen floor will be submerged.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope she looks down before someone slips on that slick surface.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This is a recipe for a rather wet disaster, I'm afraid.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The poor cabinets are going to be ruined by all this moisture.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Still, she just keeps polishing that plate, completely unfazed.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Itâ€™s almost comedic in its intensity, yet quite alarming.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Such a simple task, yet so much chaos unfolding around it.
segments.speaker: PAR
